Factsheet

Developer:
Noice2D
Based in Taipei, Taiwan
Release date:
Web Preview: 15 Dec, 2018
Platforms:
Mobile-friendly Web Html5
iOS App Store: Summer 2019
Website:
noice2d.com/klee
Regular Price:
Free: Ad-supported
Web Html5 License: Please contact us

Description

Klee is a fast-paced arcade game. Clean up game rooms with your auto-blaster guns and simple virtual button control! Oh, and don't forget to recycle the stabilized $energy_cores$ to save the world!

History

Web Html5 Preview

Dec 2018

Features

  • Auto-aiming and gunning platformer
  • Simple virtual button control
  • Randomized gameplay
